name: sweet sorghum grain to generic market for energy feed | protein feed, 100% crude | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7598/documentation

This is a linking activity that converts sweet sorghum grain into gross energy for the feed market and protein, 100% crude for the feed market. ;The naming of the dataset is based on the feed nomenclature system of the National Research Council (USA).  Products with less than 20 percent of protein are classified as energy feeds. Products with more than 20 percent of protein are classified as protein feeds.

The activity starts with the reception of sweet sorghum grain

The activity ends with the conversion of sweet sorghum grain into gross energy and crude protein
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: inventory based on gross energy and protein composition of raw material. Data obtained from Agroscope database of feedstuff compositions.

exchanges.description: Calculated based on crude protein content of sweet sorghum grain (0.38kg/kg dry mass). The dry mass of the reference product is 0.909kg/kg.

flow.name: protein feed, 100% crude
